t: How to Use Amazon Brand Analytics in 2025 [With Examples!]
s: April 24, 2025 - Today, Amazon Brand Analytics supports all major Amazon marketplaces, including Amazon.com, Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.ca, Amazon.de, Amazon.au, Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.in, and Amazon.fr among others. Amazon Brand Analytics shouldn’t be confused with Amazon Brand Store Insights.

t: Sponsored Brands – Increase brand awareness | Amazon Ads
s: Sign in to your account, click “Create campaign,” and choose Sponsored Brands. Give your campaign a name and choose your settings. Choose the campaign goal that aligns with your business objective. Select your ad format.
